zone.line: And draw us yet from to the End with
M. Brother no. I am not willing
Quick! that we the game not pardon
No,it falls to me not the new Burgomaster
Now, there he is, will he now daily bolder,
And for the town what does then he?
Will he not all days worse?
Obey shall one more than ever
And pay more than ever before
Ye good gentlemen, ye handsome ladies
So well dressed out, so cheek redded
Please it you me to look upon
Let here me not in vain to play
